ygData.subject: Re: When Titans collide
ygData.msgSnippet: Megatron picks up Condor, and caries him over his shoulder, He hands him off to Decapitron, Put him in one of the cells, Switchblade, go energize the ship.

Subject: Re: When Titans collide
From: Jeremiah <rdahl@...>

Megatron picks up Condor, and caries him over his shoulder, "He hands him
off to Decapitron, "Put him in one of the cells, Switchblade, go energize
the ship. Motormaster told me about what happened the first time. Somebody
get a hold of Autofire for me. Decapitron, meet me outside, I will brief
you and the Terrorcons on your mission, Fireblade. You come too". He
finishes, as he hands Condor over, and heads outside the base.

Motormaster and Wildrider's CR chambers open. Wildrider emerges still
laughing, then stops when he sees Motormaster. "Come on Wildrider, let's go
see what services we can give Megatron". Wildrider waits, and starts to
follow, "Yeah sure, you piece of scrap" he mutters to himself.

Sinnertwin takes the head into his gut hard, and curls up from the pain. He
then tries to use all four legs, to push Rippersnapper off of him.
